divs: sighting details12\27\10 @ ~ 2am. i go to take out trash. very quiet night. no wind or traffic or planes. nothing. quiet residential street.i go to take out trash. i turn and start to walk back to the house and i cant miss this thing coming very slowly up the street. v shaped craft. one light at the apex, 2 on either side, completely silent stops right over my head, maybe 400 feet. i am just amazed to be staring at this thing. only maybe 20 or 30 seconds then faster than you can believe it flies straight off. truly amazing. my big regret is i had put my cell phone on the charger in the house or i might have got a picture.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Silver Spring
There were no other sightings in Silver Spring on or around December 27th 2010
